thothbot.parallax.core.shared.lights

Class SpotLight

  • java.lang.Object
    • thothbot.parallax.core.shared.objects.Object3D
      • thothbot.parallax.core.shared.lights.Light
        • thothbot.parallax.core.shared.lights.ShadowLight
          • thothbot.parallax.core.shared.lights.SpotLight
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DimensionalObject

    public class SpotLight
extends ShadowLight
    A point light that can cast shadow in one direction.

    Affects objects using MeshLambertMaterial or MeshPhongMaterial. 

     // white spotlight shining from the side, casting shadow 
 
 SpotLight spotLight = new SpotLight( 0xffffff ); 
 spotLight.getPosition().set( 100, 1000, 100 );  
 spotLight.setCastShadow( true );  
 spotLight.setShadowMapWidth( 1024 ); 
 spotLight.setShadowMapHeight( 1024 );  
 spotLight.setShadowCameraNear( 500 ); 
 spotLight.setShadowCameraFar( 4000 ); 
 spotLight.setShadowCameraFov( 30 );  
 
 getScene().add( spotLight );
    Author:
    thothbot
